document.full_text: pakistan's spy agency should have known osama bin laden was hiding not far from its capital, afghanistan's defense ministry said on wednesday, the first direct comment from kabul about its neighbor's apparent inability to track the al qaeda leader.
document.title: afghanistan says pakistan should have known bin laden was there
lines_and_colors: pakistan's spy agency should have known osama bin laden was hiding not far from its capital, afghanistan's defense ministry said on wednesday, the first direct comment from kabul about its neighbor's apparent inability to track the al qaeda leader.
